works.description:
The whole below post was copied word for 

word on that blog. A lot of the material is copied by other bloggers but i
 
have requested them to make their own changes to it. There has not been
any  
change made here. I have tried to contact the person directly with no  
response.


This is the post
  Telugu Desam Party (TDP) - gets a Rajya Sabha ticket for it's funds  
provider - Sujana Chowdary
Yalamanchili Satyanarayana Chowdary popularly known as Sujana Chowdary [he
 
owns the Sujana group of companies], is known to be the funds provider for
 
TDP and close to it's leader Chandrababu Naidu. Naidu owes a lot to  
Chowdary and he repaid him by getting him a Rajya Sabha ticket. Sujana  
Chowdary has no political experience [not that it is required for him to
be  
a rajya sabha member], but was given the seat inspite of several deserving
 
heavy weights of the party.

Another fact is Chowdary belongs to the same caste as Mr. Naidu - Kamma.  

TDP is heavily a kamma caste leadership. TDP has become a NTR family
affair  
supported by the wallets of people like Sujana Chowdary. This party has  
gone to the dogs. It cannot be a valid opposition party to the congress  
anymore.
